channel.title: Projects on Vijay Waghmare
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Vijay Waghmare

item.title: Project 1: Signal processing and time series classification (Multi-Class)
item.description: Problem: Fatigue level is a psychological state which is difficult to gauge using non-invasive techniques. Data was taken from an existing research paper where 8 participants performed 3 different activities for 3 hours each. IMU and Heart Rate data was captured independent variables. RPE (Rating of Physical Exertion using Borg’s RPE scale) was used as dependent variable which was collected from each participant at 10 minutes time step. Challenges: Data availability - Linear acceleration instead of triaxial acceleration.
